main event: Three irregularly shaped objects, glowing reddish-white color moving slowly and silently were observed in Easton, Maryland on June 30, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 15-20 seconds,The objects were seen to make an extremely rapid departure rather than a flight,Three red and CAP light planes were spotted in the area shortly before the sighting,The objects emitted a 'throb-bings' amber glow indicating some internal mechanism,Reports suggest the glowing objects were not conventional aircraft.
sighted object: three irregularly shaped glowing reddish-white objects
witness description: Witnessed by local residents, including a reliable character witness.
